description:
Mozilla Firefox 137 open-source web browser is now available for download with HEVC playback support on Linux and other changes. Here’s what’s new!

The post Mozilla Firefox 137 Is Now Available with HEVC Playback Support on Linux appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Mozilla Firefox 137 Is Now Available with HEVC Playback Support on Linux

description:
Nitrux 3.9.1 Linux distribution is now available for download with a new convergent web browser, Mesa 25 graphics stack, and Linux 6.13.8. Here's what else is new in this release!

The post Immutable Distro Nitrux 3.9.1 Brings New Convergent Web Browser, Linux 6.13 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Immutable Distro Nitrux 3.9.1 Brings New Convergent Web Browser, Linux 6.13
